PRODUCT_DESCRIPTION: The Alexandria Leather Lift-Top Console offers the perfect blend of style and utility in a convenient space to store all your living essentials. Embodying timeless elegance, this exquisite piece is wrapped in luxurious stone leather, exuding a sense of sophistication that elevates any living space. The Lift-Top Console is more than just a visual treat. It’s fitted with European Style hinges, creating a smooth and reliable opening mechanism that reveals a convenient storage space. Tuck away your essentials, from remote controls to magazines, and enjoy a clutter-free, organized living area. But the Alexandria doesn’t stop there. The console is equipped with dual removable cupholders, providing a secure spot for your beverages and further helping to keep your space pristine and spill-free. Additionally, the Alexandria caters to your modern lifestyle with two integrated USB ports. Keep your devices powered up and within reach, ensuring you never miss an important call or a favorite show’s finale.

DESCRIPTION: Alexandria Armless Leather Reclining Chair with Power Footrest, Chocolate
PRODUCT_DESCRIPTION: Experience the ultimate fusion of elegance and comfort with the Alexandria Chocolate Armless Leather Power Recliner. Wrapped in a sophisticated chocolate leather, this stunning piece of furniture exudes a timeless aesthetic that can perfectly complement any home decor. Sink into the deep cushioning of the bustle back and relax on the high-density foam cushioning for an ultra-comfortable seat, providing the perfect place to unwind after a long day. Each sit is a sumptuous experience that indulges and soothes your body. Adding to the Alexandria’s outstanding comfort features is a powered footrest. Easily operated at the touch of a button, it offers an additional layer of relaxation. It opens smoothly and quickly, offering an ideal elevation for your legs, ensuring the perfect reclining position for watching your favorite shows, reading a book, or taking a quick nap.
ADDITIONAL_INFORMATION:
Crafted from Chocolate colored top-grain leather with matching faux-leather backs and sides,
